intro.description: You can currently export to PDF, CSV and HTML formats.

item.title: Start the Export Wizard
item.description: Right click on a Test Module and choose Export. In the Export dialog expand the Language Buddy section and choose Export Language Test Module.

subitem.label: Choose the File Format to export.
The PDF export has some additional options that you can specify in the second page of the wizard.
Click Finish to perform the export. The exported file should be visible in the same folder as the orginal file with the same filename except for the extension.
